sentences.english: Enters the temple visit current affairs to take off shoes essential.
sentences.chinese: 進入寺廟參觀時務必要脫鞋。

sentences.english: Sitting comfortably at number three is Bagan Temple and Pagodas.
sentences.chinese: 排在第三位的是蒲甘寺廟和寶塔。

sentences.english: There's a temple in the middle of Hanoi.
sentences.chinese: 在這個寺廟內有三個非常大的金剛石柱子。

sentences.english: Explicit sex is on show in the temples, while the movies don't even get to first base.
sentences.chinese: 露骨的性愛在寺廟裏上演，而電影甚至不能達到一壘。

sentences.english: The temple is built in the likeness of the universe and i alsos its reduced image.
sentences.chinese: 寺廟被構建的和宇宙相當近似甚至就是宇宙的翻版。

sentences.english: When leaving the temple, inadvertently looked up and saw a spider on the beam.
sentences.chinese: 離開寺廟的時候，不經意間擡頭看見了橫樑上的蛛蛛。

sentences.english: So the temple can't receive any dead bodies to cremate for almost two months now.
sentences.chinese: 所以寺廟近兩個月來不能接受任何屍體火化。

sentences.english: Previously each city had its own elementalist temple.
sentences.chinese: 先前每個城市有它自己的自然力守護神的寺廟。

sentences.english: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.chinese: 他們用許多蠟燭照亮這個寺廟。

sentences.english: He jumped onto the horse and galloped in the direction of the temple .
sentences.chinese: 他跳上馬，朝寺廟方向飛奔而去。

sentences.english: Some light incense sticks at the several little altars all around the temple.
sentences.chinese: 幾個插滿了香燭的祭壇環繞在寺廟的四周。

sentences.english: As so often, apparently, the fox shrine was a hidden-away part of a larger and more public temple-complex.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，公衆熟悉的大的寺廟常常刻意隱藏狐仙廟。

sentences.english: He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.
sentences.chinese: 每逢既望之日他都會去寺廟燒香。

sentences.english: Eric pursuit to the temple, enlightenment and perched on a day.
sentences.chinese: 阿力追擊到寺廟，並挾持天悟。

sentences.english: OK. Here's the story as I am told it.
sentences.chinese: 在河內的中部有個寺廟。

sentences.english: Often he slept in Buddhist temples where monks gave him food and shelter for the night.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕉常常睡在寺廟，寺裏的和尚給他提供食宿。

definition: variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
